summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a Civilian Crime Report submitted by A. Lombardino, which suggests a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves internal forwarding and review procedures within an agency.

persons.name: A. Lombardino
persons.context: Submitted a Civilian Crime Report suggesting a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Forwarding of Civilian Crime Report
events.description: An email chain forwards a Civilian Crime Report from A. Lombardino suggesting a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein for internal review.

keyFacts: A Civilian Crime Report was submitted by A. Lombardino suggesting a prisoner possesses information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The report was forwarded internally via email on August 24, 2020, for review.
The correspondence indicates standard internal procedures for handling such submissions.
